profile:
The Plumbing Expert Mechanical Services, Inc. is pleased to offer Plumbing, Filtration and Drain services around the GTA. An honest plumbing company based on a good reputation. What we offer is plumbers! Not technicians! We have over 14 years of experience and service to the Greater Toronto area and know what it takes get the job done right in the most cost effective way possible. We live in your neighborhood and understand your needs. We are a proud Canadian owned and operated which keeps us grounded and accountable. To earn your trust, we fix the problem the first time. We take pride in all our work including: 
• Low water pressure 
• Household Leaks 
• Appliance Installation
• Plumbing Fixtures Repair & Installation
• Sewage & Sump Pumps 
• Drain Cleaning & Repairs 
• Water Quality & Filtration systems
• Water Conservation 
• Custom homes 
• Renovation 
• Remodelling 
• Roughing in

profile:
Black Forest Plumbing is a small, hands-on, family run company with a goal to supply the best plumbing service, at a fair price to our customers in the GTA and beyond. Our knowledgeable and experienced plumbers will provide you with sound advice for all your plumbing needs whether it is repair, maintenance or new installations. 

At Black Forest Plumbing in Holland Landing, we are so confident in your 100% guaranteed satisfaction, that our policy is "fix right or it's free", for your peace of mind. Our practice of supplying you with an up-front cost estimate ensures there are no surprises at the end, and no up-selling for unnecessary repairs. We repair and install all plumbing in a residential and commercial setting. To list a few of our services, we handle: blocked drains, sump pumps, sewage pumps, well systems, hot water , frozen pipes, burst pipes, leaks , leak locates , drain cameras, sinks and much more. We service all of the GTA including Newmarket, Aurora, Markham, Richmond Hill, Thornhill, Toronto, and much more. Give us a try, and let us earn your business!

Our company provides a wide range of repair, maintenance, and improvement services; for both residential and commercial locations. We do jobs both big and small: from a one hour quick fix, up to full remodels.

We pride ourselves in the relationships that we establish with our clients. Our clients are satisfied with our work because we always exceed their expectations.
